summary: The diff updates the global theme variables (Deep Indigo palette) and loads/uses Inter globally, and it replaces the Topbar logo references with new filenames. However, no new static logo assets were added under frontend/public/assets/generated (diff shows 0 added files), so the asset requirement is not met. The diff also introduces logo usage on the Login page and adds extra CSS utilities not explicitly requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded logo image as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and standardize filenames so they can be referenced by the UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary indicates no files were added, and there is no evidence of new image assets being created under frontend/public/assets/generated. The UI now references new filenames (fy-*.png), but the corresponding static assets are not shown as added.

hallucinated_features.description: Added rendering of the new logo mark on the Login page.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only specifies replacing logo images in the global header (Topbar). It does not request adding logos to the Login screen.
These utilities are not mentioned in the BuildRequest requirements (palette + font + header logo replacement).
